animeDescription: Animated promotional trailer for the Guilty Gear X, a game for PlayStation 2 and PC. Included in Guilty Gear X2's extras.
animeStaff: [['Tanaka Hideyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Shimoda Masami', ['Storyboard']], ['Ishiwatari Daisuke', ['Character Design']], ['Hirose Yoshinori', ['Art Director']]]
